subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] My first YouTube video (yep!  ANOTHER one out there now)
author: Bryan Whatley
full_text:
--0-54059700-1209349961=:26779
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Yeah, it's pretty cool.

I think Nostradamus did use something similar with fire and water gazing, also called scrying (often used with a mirror too), along with meditation, nutmeg as a hallucinogen, and a plethora of other techniques.  Although I think he used it to see the future rather than people from the past.  However, I think you can use it for both.


----- Original Message ----
From: Michael Edwards <f1cracker75@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, April 27, 2008 3:34:59 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] My first YouTube video (yep!  ANOTHER one out there now)


Wher have I been.....??
 
I finally got a look at the video!
 
That is amazing Margaret and Bryan!
 
So is this what Nostradamas used as well? I have watched several shows on him, and he uses a black bowl with a candle.
 
Mike Edwards

Bryan Whatley <bryan_whatley@ yahoo.com> wrote:
Ok, so since I love to try new things out and have been wanting to try this out for a while, I hooked up a loop last night with my web cam and got several images.  Via the way I hooked it up, I was actually able to broadcast this online to a friend of mine live via yahoo messenger.  While watching the video loop live with me, my friend started pointing out several immediately as the images appeared.  Here is one she saw, but I wanted to get your guys opinionated too.  Please tell me what you see, if anything at all. 

Thanks,
Bryan 


----- Original Message ----
From: Wiliam Clarke <reesclarke_69@ yahoo.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Sent: Sunday, April 27, 2008 9:03:26 AM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] My first YouTube video (yep! ANOTHER one out there now)


I watch your video over and over, and I see something new everytime!

Bryan Whatley <bryan_whatley@ yahoo.com> wrote:
pretty cool.

I might have to try that out.  Thanks  for posting it. :)


----- Original Message ----
From: itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@ aol.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Sent: Saturday, April 26, 2008 2:37:32 AM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] My first YouTube video (yep! ANOTHER one out there now)


OMGosh. It took me forever to figure out how to do everything to create my YouTube video, 
but I finally got it all together and posted. I've never done anything of this nature before. 
LOL - sometimes I can be a wee bit on the technologically challenged side! ;-)

http://www.youtube. com/watch? v=Dmlox_8H5lo

Hope you enjoy it if you decide to watch. I figured another video promoting the POSITIVE 
side to spirit communication would help counterbalance some of the garbage out there. 

Margaret
